project.name: PTNA - Public Transport Network Analysis
project.description: PTNA provides a daily analysis of public transport lines mapped in OSM. Such lines are described in OSM by relations of type 'route' and 'route_master' and the categories 'train', 'subway', 'bus'. The analyzes are carried out for selected areas and networks.

tags.description: Analysis done for values: 'route_master' and 'route'. Other values used: 'multipolygon', 'public_transport' and 'network'.
Analysis done for values: 'train', 'subway', 'light_rail', 'tram', 'trolleybus', 'bus', 'ferry', 'monorail', 'aerialway', 'funicular', 'share_taxi' (, 'coach').

The tag 'line' is reserved for 'power' = 'line' related tagging. For public transport 'route_master' and 'route' are used.

Check value on 'route' relation: either '1' or '2'.
Check whether the tag 'route_ref' on the stops of a 'route' relation includes the value of 'ref' of the route.
Check value of 'service' tag for 'highway' = 'service'. Suspicious values: 'drive-through', driveway', 'emergency_access', 'parking_aisle'.
